name: Inventory Report
query:
SELECT
    i.item_name AS `Item Name`,
    SUM(sle.actual_qty) AS `Current Stock`,
    GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(w.warehouse_name, ': ', sle.actual_qty) SEPARATOR ', ') AS `Site-wise Distribution`
FROM
    `tabItem` i
LEFT JOIN
    `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle ON i.item_code = sle.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabWarehouse` w ON sle.warehouse = w.name
GROUP BY
    i.item_code
